title: WRF-CMake: integrating CMake support into the Advanced Research WRF (ARW) modelling system
description: WRF-CMake adds CMake support to the latest versions of the Advanced Research Weather Research and Forecasting (WRF) model. This page is used to maintain a permanent DOI for versions of WRF-CMake. For information about WRF-CMake, please refer to the WRF-CMake repository on GitHub.
